products.description: A fantastic neutral, this textured geometric fabric is simple yet effective at creative depth, whilst adding a soft pop of colour to your home. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new curtaincomes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Tweety Charcoal - Roman Blind

Its contemporary bird and tree patterning plays host to a muted charcoal grey, as well as understated tones of sage green, ice blue, indigo purple, mustard yellow, and creamy biscuit. What more could you want?Hang the charcoal in the living room or kitchen, where the sweet birds will sit pretty and add character to the space. Choose an accent colour from the blind and use it throughout the room to bring the tone to life.

The taupe will work beautifully as a delicate neutral to temper bolder colours. Try it with a wine and cream colour scheme, opted for a boldly printed wallpaper and rich, dark floors.

products.title: Kensington Stone - Roman Blind
products.description: Adorned with colourful fruits, the kensington in stone is sure to whet the appetite. The grey-toned white of the background provides a serene base that allows the deep blue, red, and coral hues to truly pop, offering a gorgeously understated sensation of colour. This array of fruit surely belongs in the kitchen or dining room. Place against a feature wall in deep blue or burnt orange and use the same colours to accent with accessories throughout the rest of the room.

products.title: Nightshade Mist - Day Night Blind
products.description: In pale, silvery white, the nightshade in mist offers an opaque double layering of heavily stitched fabric, which plays host to the sliding strips of translucent netting. For an easy, streamlined effect, the controls are neatly hidden from view in the blind's rail cassette, from which the blind hangs neatly and easily. Use the mist to complement a petrol blue and soft grey colour scheme in a contemporary living room, where it will look striking against a blue feature wall.
